description: This file defines a React component 'GameBoard' that manages the frontend UI for a tic-tac-toe game, fetching game state, handling user moves, and rendering the game board and status messages.

methods.name: GameBoard
methods.description: React functional component for rendering and interacting with a tic-tac-toe game board.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicking a cell, performs move if valid.
